/usr/bin/g++ CMakeFiles/simple_cuda.dir/src/hello_world.cu.o -o simple_cuda  /usr/local/cuda-12.6/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/librt.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/aarch64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/aarch64-linux/lib"
